statements: DELETE FROM order_book_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price > 100;
DELETE FROM order_book_data WHERE order_id = 101 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM order_book_data WHERE price > 1000 AND quantity < 50;

DELETE FROM order_books WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price > 100.00;

DELETE FROM order_history WHERE status = 'filled' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
